component.name: LXCOMM
component.summary: Mod browser, downloader and manager made for XCOM2(WOTC) on Linux

description.p: Mod browser, downloader and manager made specifically for non-Steam versions of XCOM2(WOTC) on Linux.

This program makes use of SteamCMD for interacting with and downloading from the Steam Workshop. For convenience, this flatpak comes with SteamCMD bundled. See [Steam's Subscriber Agreement](https://store.steampowered.com/subscriber_agreement/) for their usage terms.
